ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_05_16.shtml: new zmap release notes for 16 May 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_05_16.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 16/05/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs.c: Remove this call, due to side effects on --version g_option_context_add_group (context, gtk_get_option_group (TRUE));
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: Step back in time for testing
  • doc/obsolete/: MAC_G2.README, PERFORMANCE.README, TODO, design_notes.shtml, issues.html, lace.changes, porting_install.shtml, user_guide.shtml: Web reorganisation.
  • doc/talks/header.ini: directory will be copied to web, but not linked as yet...
  • doc/Release_notes/: header.ini, this_links.ini: header.ini gets generated now
  • doc/TODO: See Request Tracker now
  • doc/: ZMap_XCode.shtml, coding_notes.html, design_notes.shtml, foo_canvas.html, gdk_events.txt, issues.html, lace.changes, porting_install.shtml, resource_files.html, user_guide.shtml, user_interface.shtml, xremote_overview.shtml: Moved html files out of here...
  • doc/header.ini: Removed header.ini - these are generated now.
  • doc/index.shtml: See web/index.shtml instead
  • doc/: ZMap_Configuration.shtml, ZMap_Styles.shtml, column_config.README, styles.README: more reorganisation...
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: back to actual last release date [16th]
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapCmdLineArgs.h, zmapApp/zmapAppwindow.c, zmapUtils/zmapCmdLineArgs.c: Interface change. Subtle difference between popt & g_option
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: web site reorganisation
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_05_16.shtml: Correct the version number. This html output is the result of running the script _after_ the build was run. Hence, the version update number was 1 greater than the actual version it refers to.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDump.c: Fix for Rt ticket #59775. Temporarily set the colour of "transparent" items to be that of the item underneath.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c: Never honour the mark when bumping in the navigator...
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: Fix issues with drawing homologies including RT tickets involved with #67716.

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w2/graphgtk.c: add missing 'help' cntl-h key for acedb windows.
  • w4/banner.c: move simon off to the sanger section, remove rob.
  • whelp/: Tree.html, acedb.html: update tree view help for short cuts + add section on general acedb short cuts.
  • wmake/DARWIN_FINK_DEF: add darwin build for fink install of gtk etc...
  • w4/newkey.c: new parameter for ksetClassComplete(), no effect for this code.
  • w4/mainpick.c: new parameter for ksetClassComplete(), so mainpick code can specify that keyset window closes after pick.
  • wh/bump.h: fix stupid missing include.
  • wh/: keysetdisp.h, main.h: new parameter for ksetClassComplete().
  • wh/regular.h: add null key define.
  • wh/display.h: new parameter for displayblock, so function code can destroyt keyset window after pick.
  • w6/ksetdisp.c: Try to get keyset code to preserve active window before it was called while destroying itself.
  • w6/display.c: Add code to allow caller to specify that active graph should disappear once block has gone.
  • w6/treedisp.c: Add new short cuts, make tabbing work, make cursor keys work. Unify keyboard handling. Make scrolling while cursoring work. Tidy up much.
  • w2/gex.c, wh/gex.h: add options for fixed width font and no word wrap.
  • w6/action.c, w7/fmapfeatures.c, w9/blxparser.c: add new parameters for fixed width font and no word wrap.
  • w7/griddisp.c: add new param for destroying keyset window after user pick.
  • w6/treedisp.c: add 'show all tags' short cut, fix preserve bug, fix active box across redraws.
  • w7/: fmap_.h, smapconvert.c: put tag2 information into segs so we can identify embedded features.
  • wh/colcontrol.h: fix up keyboard callback, needs modifier and add drawn state.
  • w7/colcontrol.c: fix missing include.
  • w7/gmap_.h: add missing func prototype.
  • w7/gmapconvert.c: trivial reformatting etc.
  • w7/gmapdisp.c: add private gmap header. add find locus and highlight loci funcs with shortcuts.
  • w7/gmapintervalcol.c: fix up includes.
  • w7/gmaplocuscol.c: add some useful funcs to find segs, get/test keys, highlight genes.
  • w7/: gmapmarkercol.c, gmapremarkcol.c, gmapsubmapcol.c: add gmap private header.
  • wh/gmap.h: add come func. protoypes and comments.
  • w6/treedisp.c: major rewrite of treedisp moving code. unify keyboard routnes. Remove code to subfunctions. Fix current graph bugs.
  • whelp/Tree.html: Add space bar short cut...
  • wmake/truemake: ensure that command line only programs do not have gtk/x11 lib dependencies.
  • wmake/: DARWIN_4_DEF, DARWIN_FINK_DEF, DARWIN_UNIVERSAL_DEF, LINUX_4_DEF, LINUX_4_RH9_DEF, LINUX_64_DEF, OPTERON_4_DEF: add glib def to remove gtk/xlib dependencies from command line ace progs.
  • w9/blxview.c: trivial formatting.
  • w9/belvu.c: fix up gex editor call, new param needed. formatting changes.
  • w3rdparty/: include-config, libs-config: fix up args to these scripts, don't need glib and gtk. Remove shifting junk.
